message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the purchase of this valuable product with you. I believe it's a fantastic opportunity for you to acquire a unique asset. I'm willing to offer you the product for $1,400,000. This is a competitive price considering its worth to you is $1,200,000. I'm confident you'll find it a worthwhile investment.

Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate your enthusiasm. However, $1,400,000 is above my budget. I'm willing to offer you $1,250,000 for the product. I believe this is a fair price considering the value it brings to me, and it's a good starting point for our negotiation.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand your budget constraints, but I'm not willing to go as low as $1,250,000. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer you the product for $1,350,000. This is still a great deal for you, considering the value it brings to you, and it's a compromise that I'm willing to make to reach a mutually beneficial agreement.

Alice, I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but $1,350,000 is still a bit out of my range. To make this deal work, I'm willing to go up to $1,300,000. This represents a significant investment for me and I'm confident we can reach a mutually beneficial agreement at this price.

Bob, I understand your willingness to invest in this product, and I appreciate your flexibility. However, I'm still not willing to go as low as $1,300,000. I'm willing to make one more concession and offer you the product for $1,325,000. This is the lowest price I'm willing to accept, and I believe it's still a great value for you considering the benefits it will bring. I'm open to further discussion, but I'm not willing to go any lower.
